item.title: What Does “Five Nines” Mean to You?
item.description:
Authored by John Shepler Decoding Five Nines: A Look at Reliability The gold standard for traditional phone service and high-end network gear is “five nines reliability.” But what’s the meaning behind this commonly used phrase? Let’s find out. Availability vs. Reliability “Five nines” translates to 99.999%, a figure often mistaken for reliability. In reality, it represents “availability.” True availability goes beyond just hardware failures; it encompasses the actual usable time of a system...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/what-does-five-nines-mean-to-you/
